programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: Big Cat Tales
programme.desc: Big Cat Tales is an Animal Planet documentary series following wild felines in the Masai Mara National Park in Kenya. Jonathan Scott, his wife Angie and Jackson Looseyia get close to the Marsh Pride family of lions, Malika the cheetah and Bahati the leopard, and learn about their behaviors and motherly instincts, as the cats try to survive in the wild. Watch them as they raise and protect their cubs, hunt for buffalos and impalas, and face various challenges of the African savanna.

programme.title: Saved By the Barn
programme.desc: Dan McKernan was earning a six figure salary at a tech company in Austin, Texas, when his father called from the family farm in Michigan, asking him to take the reigns. Instantly, Dan knew what he wanted to do, and left his city life behind to create a sanctuary for farmyard animals that have suffered abuse, neglect or simply dont have a home. At his Barn Sanctuary, the animals are given a new lease of life, with spacious land to roam and see out the remainder of their years. The cameras document what life is like for the family and the animals living at the 140-year-old farm in this heartwarming reality series.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: When thinking about the strongest and most fearsome predators on the planet, we tend to think of such creatures as lions, grizzlies, anacondas and great white sharks. However, this series aims to reveal how size doesnt necessarily matter as, pound-for-pound, some of the most powerful animals on the planet inhabit micro-worlds beneath our feet. The use of cutting edge camera techniques reveals these minute environments and the formidable creatures who live there. Join our hosts, wildlife author and expert Bradley Trevor Greive and biodesigner Billy Almon, as they travel to some of the most demanding and unwelcoming habitats to investigate these tiny beasts and measure their abilities and make comparisons.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Return To Shark Island
programme.desc: Shark scientist Dr. Craig OConnell, and Reunions CRA Shark Protection Program, investigates the ongoing shark crisis that is threatening this former island paradise.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Pit Bulls and Parolees
programme.desc: American reality series following the team at the Villalobos Rescue centre on their quest to rescue and rehome dogs. Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. Alongside Tia are her team of dog-loving parolees, each tasked with training, rescuing and caring for the animals. Each episode covers the emotional stories of both her employees and their rescue dogs. Will their jobs help them as they transition away from jail or will they struggle alongside the pups to rebuild their reputation?

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: American animal TV series with designer Antonio Ballatore own show creating the perfect space for pet owning families. Believing that if dad can have a "man cave" and mum a "she shed" then surely there is such thing as a animal crib?! Antonios passion for design and animals shines through throughout every episode. Joined by project manager Grace and their trusty companion Chewie the Bulldog they produce the most fantastic spaces for both pets and their owners. Pets include Chinchillas, dogs, cats and snakes and possibly many more.

programme.title: The Last Alaskans
programme.desc: The Last Alaskans is an American reality TV series following several families and trappers who are allowed to live in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska. Have a close look at their daily routine in the most remote area of the US. Far away from the civilization, they have to deal with harsh weather and arctic conditions, wildlife and long distances without any modern conveniences. Heimo, Bob, Ray, Tyler and their families offer you an honest view of their struggle and thrive in Alaskas untouched wilderness.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Alaskan Bush People is an American docudrama-style reality TV series revolving around the Brown family, members of which are trying to survive in the wilderness, far away from the society. Take a journey deep into Alaskas bush, where naturalist and adventurer Billy Brown, along with his wife, Ami, and their seven children, choose to live life on their own terms, connected to wild nature and bonded to each other.

programme.title: Sharks Vs Dolphins: Face Off
programme.desc: Sharks and dolphins have shared the ocean for ages, but only recently, scientists have begun to understand the true nature of the relationship between these two masters of the sea.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: Ukrainecast
programme.desc: The US president backed Kyiv to regain its territory at the UN General Assembly.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Business Today
programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.desc: A round-up of the days sporting action.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: AI Decoded
programme.desc: An urgent call for binding international measures against dangerous uses of AI.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: На вечеринке "Трансгаза" был отравлен вице-президент компании. Раскрыть "щекотливое" дело берутся Никонов, Скребцов и Аня. Но что стало причиной трагедии: любовные связи или грязный бизнес?

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: В городе происходит несколько нападений на инкассаторские машины. Налеты проводят дерзко, с убийствами. Дело дают в руки лучшего опера Киева Виктора Тарана, если он раскроет его, сможет претендовать на место начальника. А если банду не найдут в ближайшее время, то могут полететь головы вышестоящего начальства, так как обеспеченные влиятельные люди не любят терять свои деньги.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Оперативники находят машину, которую использовали грабители. Её владелец – алкоголик, который недавно отдал старое авто малознакомому парню. Один из бизнесменов, которому светит приговор, доносит генералу, кто меняет украденные из инкассаторских машин наличные. Если органы не захотят оказывать ему услугу, им придется объяснять прессе связь с крупными инвесторами, которые по стечению обстоятельств работают с менялами.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Раненый грабитель пытается самостоятельно вытянуть шар из ноги, затрагивает артерию и умирает. Милиция приезжает к нему на квартиру слишком поздно. Таран уверен, что последний налет организовал Таир, пытаясь отвести от себя подозрения. Но ни у одного из отделов никаких серьезных доказательств нет. Таран предлагает объединить свои усилия, чтобы найти убийц как можно скорее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. В квартире беглеца грабителя находят целый "арсенал", теперь операм становится неясно, зачем грабителям надо было нападать на участкового. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Никонов и Ко
programme.desc: На вечеринке "Трансгаза" был отравлен вице-президент компании. Раскрыть "щекотливое" дело берутся Никонов, Скребцов и Аня. Но что стало причиной трагедии: любовные связи или грязный бизнес?

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Раненый грабитель пытается самостоятельно вытянуть шар из ноги, затрагивает артерию и умирает. Милиция приезжает к нему на квартиру слишком поздно. Таран уверен, что последний налет организовал Таир, пытаясь отвести от себя подозрения. Но ни у одного из отделов никаких серьезных доказательств нет. Таран предлагает объединить свои усилия, чтобы найти убийц как можно скорее.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Убийство двух оперативников, самоубийство подозреваемого и арест коллеги при попытке незаконно купить оружие – все это сваливается на Тарана за одну ночь. В квартире беглеца грабителя находят целый "арсенал", теперь операм становится неясно, зачем грабителям надо было нападать на участкового. Они начинают расследовать его возможной причастности к налетам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Таран узнает о покушении на преступника, который должен выйти из тюрьмы. Милиция организует подставного киллера, чтобы взять заказчика с поличным. Одновременно в городе скинхеды убивают молодого парня, главаря смельчаков, которые защищали приезжих чернокожих студентов.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Идейный парень стреляет в убийцу своего друга и прячется. Его начинают искать и милиция, и скинхеды. Компания расистов собирают на допрос, однако все они молчат и требуют адвокатов. Удается нажать только на одного парня, с условным сроком.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Умирающая девушка отчаянно нуждается в пересадке сердца. Её отец (приглашённая звезда Генри Черни) получает уведомление о том, что появилось донорское сердце. По прибытии в больницу обнаруживается, что сердце будет отдано другому, разозленный отец берет в заложники больничное крыло и требует, чтобы сердце отдали его дочери.

programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Follow the crazy animated adventures of Lamput, a gooey orange substance that escaped from a secret laboratory as two scientists, Fat Doc and Slim Doc, try their best to catch him. They get themselves in various hilarious situations in an attempt to capture him, but being a master of disguise and having the ability to change shape, Lamput escapes from right under their noses each and every time.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence

Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. / Gumball and Darwin have to stop Alan from becoming Class President of Elmore Junior High. / Nicole remembers the day she first met Richard, and the different choices she could have made.

programme.desc: When the Wattersons internet cuts out, they have to adapt to a world without it. / Gumball decides to make some changes when an online personality test tells him that hes "The Loser". / Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app… / Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts safely. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Follow the crazy animated adventures of Lamput, a gooey orange substance that escaped from a secret laboratory as two scientists, Fat Doc and Slim Doc, try their best to catch him. They get themselves in various hilarious situations in an attempt to capture him, but being a master of disguise and having the ability to change shape, Lamput escapes from right under their noses each and every time.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: African Voices: Change makers is a CNN programme that focuses on some of Africas brightest and most brilliant change makers as they engineer innovative solutions or beneficial changes that will positively impact their communities. CNN is a constantly evolving and diversifying channel and African Voices is evidence of this new approach to news, utilising sources from across the globe. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: Unique access to the latest African market information, with a look at events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the business stories that influence the African continent. Eleni Giokos is a CNN correspondent based in the networks Johannesburg bureau and the shows host. Every week she interviews figures of business and industry to reveal the economic trends in various regions of Africa and to present the continents key sectors and corporations.

programme.title: CNN Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: CNN Marketplace Europe offers unique access to the latest European market information, with a look at latest events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the top business stories that influence and shape the European continent. Have a look at the interviews with outstanding figures of business and industry and reveal the economic trends in various regions of Europe to get to know the continents key sectors and corporations.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Each week, Inside Africa documentary series on CNN highlights the unique diversity of mysterious Africa, its numerous cultures and religions, peoples, art, music, cuisine, travel and literature, its one-of-a-kind flora and fauna. Watch the interviews with people from various spheres of life and find out more surprising facts about this continent: how it fights for conservation of rare animals, who the new figures in fashion and design are, what the new educational programs for children look like. Everything what Africa is filled with and lives for is in this series.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Connect the World
programme.desc: Join high profile news anchor Becky Anderson live from Abu Dhabi as she brings you all the latest news from around the world . This is CNNs international flagship current affairs prime time news program. CNN is one of Americas biggest news broadcasters, truth seekers and story tellers. Reaching nearly every corner of the world, with a dedicated and experienced team of journalists, designers and technologists, CNN bears witness to history as it unfolds.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Global affairs programme in which host Christiane Amanpour analyses some of the most relevant stories from around the world, often adding her personal experiences. She also interviews a variety of notable, high-profile people and key players from various fields.

programme.title: Isa Soares Tonight
programme.desc: Isa Soares deep dives into todays top stories with insightful conversations and reports from around the world.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip delivers a smart, sharp approach to the days biggest stories.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: Todays world is watched by billions of cameras; CCTV, dash cams, home surveillance and mobile phones capture crazy incidents every day. This documentary series examines clips that exploded on the internet, the videos that amassed millions of views to become viral. Break-ins, car chases, angry confrontations; Crimes Gone Viral has it all. And not satisfied with just the clips, the show delves deeper into the story behind each video with interviews and insider information.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: Hurricane Helene barrels north, causing massive flooding in Appalachia. As the deluge sweeps away one woman, a man jumps into the water to save her.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Shed and Buried
programme.desc: Motorbike enthusiast Henry Cole and expert Sam Lovegrove travel around the UK to explore peoples sheds searching for some automotive bargains. They purchase all kinds of old cars, bikes, jeeps, tractors and other vehicles in order to renovate them and sell after the rehabilitation work is over. The old vehicles are restored and given second life. It is a risky business and the two always wonder if they manage to make profit this time.

programme.title: Shed and Buried

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Meet the colourful characters that work in Polands scrap metal industry. Plus, a behind the scenes view of where the materials come from and where they go after the scrapyard.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Swamp Loggers
programme.desc: This American reality television series follows Bobby Goodson and the crew of Goodsons All Terrain Logging as they log (cut trees, process them and move them to a location for transport) the swamps of North Carolina. With the constant difficulties they encounter- bad weather, poor road conditions and equipment failures, as well as uncertainties concerning lumber buyers, land owners (from whose property Goodsons extract timber) and saw mills, these guys have their work cut out for them.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis hit the beach for the ultimate surf wagon: the iconic Holden Sandman. Can they transform a drab panel van into a hit budget version?

This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Fast N Loud Clip Shows
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Last One Standing
programme.desc: Cheeny has a key advantage in a friction fire elimination challenge, but her strategy puts her at risk. Blisters on Matts hand might send him home.

programme.title: 100 Days Wild
programme.desc: The brute harshness of Alaskas wilderness is no joke, with hostile weather and dangerous animals constantly lurking on the horizon. In this documentary series, a group of seven strangers give up their creature comforts to build a self-sustaining community along the Tanana River, and they have 100 days before the biting chill of winter arrives. They must quickly learn to work as a team if their makeshift community is going to work, learning to hunt, gather and implement basic structures that will keep them dry and warm. Will they be able to handle the wilderness?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Last One Standing
programme.desc: Cheeny has a key advantage in a friction fire elimination challenge, but her strategy puts her at risk. Blisters on Matts hand might send him home.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Shed and Buried
programme.desc: Motorbike enthusiast Henry Cole and expert Sam Lovegrove travel around the UK to explore peoples sheds searching for some automotive bargains. They purchase all kinds of old cars, bikes, jeeps, tractors and other vehicles in order to renovate them and sell after the rehabilitation work is over. The old vehicles are restored and given second life. It is a risky business and the two always wonder if they manage to make profit this time.

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Meet the colourful characters that work in Polands scrap metal industry. Plus, a behind the scenes view of where the materials come from and where they go after the scrapyard.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Freddy Dodges Mine Rescue
programme.desc: Mining veteran Freddy Dodge teams up with expert mechanic Juan Ibarra to help struggling mine owners with their failing operations. The pair come to the rescue sharing useful advice, practical knowledge and exclusive gold recovery techniques to transform the operations that could change the lives the mine owners forever.

programme.title: Gold Divers
programme.desc: Join the group of miners on their quest to find gold in the waters of Nome in Alaska. This reality show follows crews on boats equipped with different gadgets for gold mining- typically consisting of a sluicing apparatus, a means of paydirt collection (dredge) and a cold-water-diving life support system. With many aggravating circumstances such as rough seas, poor underwater visibility, personnel issues, ocean-damaging equipment failures and more, these tough and high tempered people risk their lives every day in hopes of finding gold and getting the big payout.

programme.title: High Speed Chase
programme.desc: A chance encounter in Utah escalates from death threats to a demolition derby on the interstate. In Illinois, a chase ends in a $250,000 drug bust.

programme.title: Hidden Traces
programme.desc: This documentary series uses cutting edge technology to shed new light on historical conflicts and the characters who lived through them with each episode dealing with a specific event or period in history. The viewer learns what daily life was really like for the common footsoldier during WWI as archeaologists bring their stories to life. An analysis of Napoleons strategy and the impact of the weather reveal why he was defeated by Wellington at Waterloo. Traces of the remains of Hitlers destroyed retreat on the Obersalzberg uncover the extent of the vast structural complex where he spent time with his mistress, Eva Braun. And, many years after the conflict in Vietnam, secret tunnels and unexploded bombs can still be found.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conﬂ ict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern-day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traﬃc, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counterterrorism forces were eﬀ ectively given a "blank cheque" when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an in-depth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an oﬃ cer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: WW1s First Frontline Cameraman
programme.desc: Geoffrey Herbert Malins is the first war kinematographer in history. The documentary he shot during the Battle of the Somme drew over 20 million British viewers in 1916. For years controversy has raged around the film due to its disconcerting violence and overt propagandist agenda,. Now, new research has proven that most of the scenes are indeed a real minute-by-minute record of the most disastrous battle in British military history. The film is a reflexion on the history of cinema and the ability to document historical events on film.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Uncle Jack: Manhattan Project and Beyond
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Ten years ago, thousands of US and Coalition forces personnel, ranging from elite soldiers to reservists, found themselves in the middle of two conﬂ icts that required an entirely diﬀ erent approach to warfare than they had previously experienced. From special forces units securing vital points of strategic interest and capturing key individuals in Afghanistan. This episode of CQB takes a close look at some of at how special operations were integrated into regular units and how they fought through many close quarter combat situations with a combination of intelligence, high-tech weaponry and surveillance technologies to ﬁ nd and capture Saddam Hussein.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Blackpool Pleasure Beach is one of the most visited attractions in the United Kingdom. People visit it not only for the fun, but to also hopefully catch a glimpse of the many ghosts that haunt there.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The former home of Queen Victoria is now home to many spirits who have been seen by guests and staff. Witness the first ever formal documentation of the paranormal activities in the Bulkeley Hotel.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We head underground and visit the Hidee Gold Mine to see how this most precious material is obtained. Then we get a tour of the brand new History Colorado Center where well explore Colorados past through first hand stories and interactive attractions.

programme.title: Journeys In India
programme.desc: No city in the Great Thar Desert of West India has had the sway that Jodhpur has. Giant forts, impressive palaces and a legendary royal hero that frees his people from tyrannical outsiders all make this a fascinating historic romp.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nicknamed the Garden of Eden, this volcanic caldera is home to over 25,000 big game animals. Here survival isnt just a game—its a matter of life and death. Youll witness one of the great acts of nature—buffalo, lion and hyena in a face-to-face struggle for dominance. Life in the crater can take surprising twists.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: It is in Santiago, Chile that we begin the extraordinary journey into the infinity that, place by place, will take us to South Patagonia, which lies between Chile and Argentina, then on to the tempestuous waters of the "end of the world". After having visited the capital, we go to Punta Arenas, the southernmost city of the South American country, it is the capital of Chilean Antarctica. Its port looks out over the Straits of Magellan and as we sail towards the "end of the world" on board an expedition ship we enter Tierra del Fuego where in Ainsworth Bay we meet a fascinating colony of elephant seals. A nature guide together with a biologist help us understand the world of these rather unknown animals, revealing to us their secrets and behaviour patterns. And this is only the first part of a long adventure.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: We fly over the waters that separate the Venezuelan coast from Los Roques, we are going to visit this archipelago together with Francesca and her father Gian Marco, Venezuelan by birth but of Italian origin, who are both passionate about the islands and the sea. We land on Gran Roque - the only small village big enough to welcome tourists to stay in the typical posadas, there are no roads, cars or chaos - we take our boat and leave for Francisquì Island, where Francesca has an appointment for her first windsurf lesson, a sport that is very popular in this windy archipelago. When her lesson is over we visit the paradise island of Craquì, where only a few fishermen live, some birds and a small family restaurant that prepare wonderful fish dishes for the tourists that arrive there.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: San Antonio is rich with Texas, Mexican, and Spanish history. We make our last stand at the Alamo, and visit Missions National Historical Park. Lastly, we spelunk the Natural Bridge Caverns underground.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: And were off! We learn the history of the world famous Kentucky Derby. Then, call your shot as we learn about one of Americas most famous brands, Louisville Slugger. Also, we zip line in the worlds only underground zip line attraction and visit the Ali Center.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch. The target is Mercury which has been too long neglected; this mission will shed new light on this strange world of light and dark.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample. The return of asteroid material to Earth will aid scientists in the evolving asteroid planetary defense systems.

Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
