programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay

The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: Duff Goldmans team and Ashley Holts team battle to make cakes inspired by their best meal ever and featuring hyper realistic food.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri digs into dynamite doughs with focaccia burgers in Colorado, decadent dulce de leche cookies in San Antonio and a Sicilian pie in Arizona.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri gets a flavour punch at a Korean-Mexican fusion place in Atlanta, an authentic Thai spot in Dallas and a real-deal Italian joint in Phoenix.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Johnny Bananas calls out fellow Worst Cooks in America competitor Mark Long, and Michael Hung settles a grudge with Chris Oh.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.desc: Shift 8: Elevation. In the final hours of the competition, the chefs must cook the best dishes of their lives for a chance at 50,000 and an unforgettable trip to Hawaii.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon creates a meal that kids will love. He makes a dairy-free tomato soup with parm crisps, BLT lettuce wraps and chocolate cake donuts.

With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Kina un Juks: Polārlapsu piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Divu lapsu piedzīvojums laikā, kad tās gatavojas pirmo reizi kļūt par vecākiem un globālā sasilšana maina likumus visiem – gan dabai, gan dzīvniekiem,

programme.title: Ragana
programme.desc: Ir 17. gs. 30. gadi Jaunanglijā. Viljamam (Ralfs Ainsons) un viņa ģimenei draud izraidīšana no ciemata, jo radies strīds ar baznīcu par Jauno Derību, tādēļ ģimene nolemj pamest ciematu. Galu galā viņi apmetas fermā savāda meža malā. Kad iet bojā iesētais, ģimene viens otru tur aizdomās paranojas iespaidā un ģimenes aizdomas vēršas pret meitu Tomasinu (Anja Tailore-Džoja). Ģimenes un fermas locekļiem liecoties zem savu aizdomu smaguma, Tomasinu sāk apsūdzēt raganu burvestībās.

programme.title: Kur vēži dzied
programme.desc: Dēlijas Ouensas sensacionālā romāna ekranizācija vēsta par Kiju – pamestu meiteni, kura pieaugusi viena pati bīstamajā Ziemeļkarolīnas dumbrājā. Gadiem ilgi tuvējā pilsētiņā Bārklijkovā klīst baumas par "purva skuķi", kas nošķir Kiju no sabiedrības. Kad viņa piesaista divu vietējo puišu uzmanību, Kija atver sirdi jaunai un pārsteidzošai pasaulei, bet, kad viens no puišiem iet bojā, visu aizdomas nekavējoties krīt uz purva vientuļnieci.

programme.title: Ārpus kartes
programme.desc: Asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filma, kas veidota pēc populāras video spēļu sērijas, aizved mūs uz visdažādākajiem pasaules nostūriem, sekojot Neitam un Sallijam, kad viņi dodas bīstamā ceļā pēc "dižākajiem, nekad neatrastajiem dārgumiem", vienlaikus meklēdami Neita sen pazudušo brāli.

programme.title: Palaidnis
programme.desc: Kopš kucēna vecuma Palaidnis ir lutināts un dzīvojis greznībā plašā savrupnamā. Taču, kad viņa turīgā saimniece dodas mūžībā, Palaidnis paliek viens un nonāk uz ielas. Siltumnīcas apstākļos augušais suns ir galīgi nepiemērots dzīvei reālajā pasaulē, un, it kā ar to būtu par maz, viņu sāk vajāt saimnieces alkatīgie radinieki, kas ar Palaidņa starpniecību cer tikt pie iespaidīga mantojuma.

programme.title: Teorija par visu
programme.desc: 20. gadsimta 60. gados Kembridžas Universitātes students un topošais fiziķis Stīvens Hokings iemīlas savā studiju biedrē Džeinā Vaildā. Kad Hokingam ir 21 gads, viņam konstatē motorā neirona slimību. Par spīti tam un ar Džeinas palīdzību viņš uzsāk ambiciozu laika izpētes projektu, lai gan puiša ārsts apgalvo, ka laika viņam ir atlicis ļoti maz. Spītējot nelaimei, Stīvens un Džeina izdara jaunus atklājumus medicīnā un zinātnē, sasniedzot vairāk, nekā abi bija spējuši iedomāties.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Mājupceļa nav
programme.desc: Pirmo reizi Zirnekļcilvēka filmu sērijas vēsturē mūsu draudzīgā apkaimes varoņa maska ir noņemta un viņš vairs nespēj nošķirt savu parasto dzīvi no riskantajām supervaroņa gaitām. Kad viņš lūdz palīdzību Doktoram Streindžam, likmes kļūst vēl augstākas, liekot viņam aptvert, ko patiesībā nozīmē būt Zirnekļcilvēkam.

programme.title: Tuksneša prinči
programme.desc: Berberu puisēna un viņa drauga kamieļa piedzīvojumi, šķērsojot tuksnesi.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Izvēle
programme.desc: Mīlestība? Atbildība? Nopietnas attiecības, ģimene? Iesīkstējušais vecpuisis Treviss Pārkers uzskata, ka tas viss nav viņam. Viņam ir labs darbs un uzticami draugi. Viņš aizraujas ar medībām, makšķerēšanu un ekstrēmiem sporta veidiem un izvairās no nopietnām attiecībām. Tomēr nav vēl dzimis cilvēks, kam būtu izdevies izvairīties no mīlestības….

programme.title: Dziedi!
programme.desc: Kad viņa teātrim draud slēgšana, uzņēmējdarbībā pieredzējušais koala Basters Mūns (Metjū Makkonahijs) sarīko dziesmu konkursu. Daudziem vietējiem zvēriem tas rada iespēju izpausties. Cūka Rosita (Rīza Viterspūna) ir māte un mājsaimniece, kura atteicās no pusaudža sapņa kļūt par dziedātāju. Pusaudze dzeloņcūka Eša (Skārleta Johansone) ir pancīga roķere alternatīvās mūzikas grupā. Gorillu Džoniju (Tārons Edžertons) viņa tēvs (Pīters Serafinovičs) grib pārliecināt pievērsties savam banku aplaupītāja arodam. Ikkatrs no šiem radījumiem vēlas piepildīt savu sapni un dziedāt no visas sirds!

programme.title: Džumandži: Laipni lūgti džungļos
programme.desc: Četri vidusskolēni atrod vecu spēļu konsoli ar līdz šim neredzētu videospēli džumandži. Viņi iesaistās šajā spēlē, kas norisinās džungļos, un iemiesojas pašu izraudzītajos avataros. Jaunieši apjauš, ka džumandži ir kas vairāk par spēli, tā ir cīņa par izdzīvošanu. Lai uzvarētu spēlē, viņiem jādodas bīstamākajā piedzīvojumā mūžā, jāatklāj Alana Periša pirms 20 gadiem atstātās pēdas un jāmaina priekšstats pašiem par sevi, pretējā gadījumā viņi paliks ieslēgti spēlē uz visiem laikiem...

programme.title: Ķēķis
programme.desc: Pusdienu steigas laikā Manhatanas restorānā "The Grill" no kases ir pazudusi nauda. Visi virtuvē strādājošie pavāri bez dokumentiem tiek pratināti, un lielākās aizdomas krīt uz Pedro. Viņš ir sapņotājs, kas allaž pamanās iekulties nepatikšanās, un ir iemīlējies Džūlijā, amerikāņu viesmīlē, kura nevēlas ielaisties nopietnās attiecībās ar viņu. Restorāna īpašnieks Rašīds ir solījis Pedro palīdzēt sakārtot dokumentus, lai viņš varētu kļūt par "legālu" darbinieku. Taču šokējošs atklājums par Džūliju pamudina Pedro uz rīcību, kas uz visiem laikiem var apturēt darbību vienā no pilsētas noslogotākajām virtuvēm.

programme.title: Greja piecdesmit nokrāsas
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Anastasija Stīla savas saslimušās istabas biedrenes vietā dodas intervēt slaveno uzņēmēju Kristianu Greju universitātes avīzei, taču meitene nenojauš, kā mainīsies viņas dzīve. Noslēpumainajam, bagātajam un ietekmīgajam Kristianam iepatīkas Ana. Lai gan meitenes seksuālā pieredze ir visai niecīga, viņa ļaujas šai dēkai un uzzina, ka Kristiana seksuālās tieksmes pārkāpj sāpju un baudas robežas.

programme.title: Draiskule
programme.desc: Kopš bērnības Eimijas brunčumednieks tēvs ir pārliecinājis viņu, ka monogāmija nav iespējama. Tagad Eimija strādā žurnāla redakcijā un dzīvo ar šādu pārliecību, baudot dzīvi, kas ir brīva no smacējošām, garlaicīgām romantiskajām saistībām, tomēr patiesībā viņa ir iegrimusi rutīnā. Reiz Eimija secina, ka sāk iemīlēties sava jaunā raksta varonī – apburošajā un veiksmīgajā sporta ārstā Āronā Konersā. Tas liek sievietei prātot, vai citi pieaugušie, tostarp šis puisis, kuram ir patiesas simpātijas pret Eimiju, varētu pārliecināt viņu mainīt dzīves filozofiju.

programme.title: Dzīves garšas
programme.desc: Eiženija ir meistarīga pavāre, kura jau vairāk nekā 20 gadus strādā pie izsmalcināta gardēža Dodēna. Laika gaitā viņu sadarbība pāraugusi romantiskās attiecībās, kas iedvesmo gardus ēdienus, par kuriem sajūsminās pat pasaules izcilākie šefpavāri. Tomēr, neraugoties uz Dodēna uzstājību, Eiženija nesteidzas teikt viņam jāvārdu. Lai mīļoto pārliecinātu, Dodēns nolemj sākt gatavot maltītes viņai.

programme.title: Zirnekļcilvēks: Ceļojums Zirnekļpasaulē
programme.desc: Fils Lords un Kristofers Millers, radošie prāti aiz "Lego filma" un "Džampstrīta 21", apvieno savus talantus un pieņem izaicinājumu – radīt unikālu skatījumu par komiksu pasaulē labi zināmo Zirnekļcilvēka visumu. Viņiem tas izdodas ar elpu aizraujošu stāstu un līdz šim neredzētu vizuālo noformējumu, pelnīti saņemot Oskaru par gada labāko animācijas filmu. "Zirnekļcilvēks. Ceļojums Zirnekļpasaulē" mūs iepazīstina ar jauno Maiklu Moralesu un vēl pieciem spilgtiem personāžiem no dažādām dimensijām, kuri apveltīti ar zirnekļ-supervaroņa spējām. Tikai darbojoties kopā, viņi var apturēt briesmas, kas apdraud visas realitātes.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Bāreņi Felīsija (Elle Faninga) un Viktors (Deins Dehāns) dzīvo 19. gs. Francijā, un abi mēģina īstenot savus sapņus. Viņš strādā Gustava Eifeļa birojā un grib kļūt par ievērojamu izgudrotāju. Viņa, neskatoties uz līdzekļu trūkumu, ar apkopējas Odetes (Kerlija Reja Džepsena) palīdzību tikusi uzņemta prestižajā Parīzes Operā. Felīsijas iedzimtais talants neiepatīkas viņas konkurentei Kamillai (Medija Cīglere) un pārējiem dejotājiem. Neskatoties uz grūtībām, Felīsija ir apņēmusies kļūt par Parīzes baleta zvaigzni!

programme.title: Tēvs Stjū
programme.desc: Patiess dzīves stāsts par bokseri, kurš kļuvis par priesteri. Kad savainojums pārtrauc amatiera karjeru, Stjuarts Longs pārceļas uz Losandželosu, lai meklētu naudu un slavu. Strādājot lielveikalā, viņš satiek Karmenu, svētdienas skolas skolotāju. Apņēmies viņu iekarot, Stjuarts sāk iet uz baznīcu, lai atstātu uz Karmenu iespaidu. Motocikla negadījums liek pārdomāt dzīvi, radot pārsteidzošu atziņu, ka viņam jākļūst par katoļu priesteri.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Superļaundaris Gru ir izmests no darba, jo neapturēja jaunāko cilvēces apdraudētāju. Viņš zaudē dzīvesprieku, bet to atgūst, kad uzzina, ka viņa neredzētais dvīņubrālis Dru vēlas viņu satikt. Gru ar ģimeni dodas uz brāļa grezno dzīvesvietu. Brāļi kopā uzsāks cīņu pret Baltazaru Bretu, kurš bērnībā bija slavenība, taču tagad kļuvis par superļaundari, kurš terorizē pasauli. Minioni uzsāk protesta streiku pret to, ka Gru vispār neinteresē iespēja valdīt pār pasauli.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Vikingu pusaudzis Hikaps dzīvo Berkas salā kopā ar savu valdonīgo tēvu. Kaujas ar pūķiem ir vikingu ikdiena un dzīves veids, taču Hikapu tās neaizrauj. Tā vietā viņš labprātāk nododas visvisādiem izgudrojumiem un apkārtnes iepazīšanai. Reiz kādā no saviem klejojumiem Hikaps sastop ievainotu pūķi, kuram palīdz atkal lidot. Šī sastapšanās maina abu dzīves. Un, kad pienāk iesvētību laiks – lielā iespēja kaujā ar pūķiem sevi pierādīt tēvam un visai ciltij –, Hikaps rīkojas pavisam neparasti.

programme.title: Ceļvedis
programme.desc: Uz patiesiem notikumiem balstītais stāsts par afroamerikāņu klasiskās mūzikas un džeza pianistu Donu Šērliju, kurš 1962. gadā kopā ar nolīgto šoferi un miesassargu Toniju Vallelongu devās koncerttūrē ASV dienvidu štatos. Tonijs Lips, mazizglītots bāra apsargs itāļu apdzīvotā rajonā Ņujorkā, saņem piedāvājumu kļūt par pasaules līmeņa melnādainā pianista, doktora Dona Šērlija šoferi koncertturnejā no Manhetenas līdz pat dienvidu štatiem. Viņi dodas braucienā, ņemot līdzi ceļvedi, kurā atzīmēti tie retie iestādījumi, kas ir droši afroamerikāņiem. Ceļojuma laikā viņi saskaras gan ar rasismu, gan ar negaidītu cilvēcību, un, par spīti abu atšķirīgumam, abu starpā uzplaukst patiesa draudzība. Mākslas filma 2019. gadā ieguvusi trīs "Oskarus" – kategorijās "Labākā pilnmetrāžas filma", "Labākais scenārijs" un "Labākais aktieris otrā plāna lomā". Tonija lomas atveidotājs Vigo Mortensens ir dāņu izcelsmes amerikāņu aktieris, kurš var lepoties ar lomu daudzveidību, tostarp triloģijā "Gredzenu pavēlnieks", Deivida Kronenberga krimināldrāmā "Vardarbības pēctecība" un daudzās citās. Donu Šērliju atveido godalgotais aktieris Maheršala Ali, kurš popularitāti guva ar detektīva Veina lomu ASV kulta TV drāmā "Patiesais detektīvs".

programme.title: Pusotrs spiegs
programme.desc: Kelvins Džoiners (Kevins Hārts) skolas laikā bija populārais puisis. Divdesmit gadus vēlāk viņš ir veiksmīgs grāmatvedis, kuru pārsteidz ziņa no Boba Stouna. Izrādās, ka patiesībā viņš ir Robijs Vīrdikts (Dveins Džonsons) – apsmietais tīnis viņa skolā. Bobs ir trenējies divdesmit gadus un šobrīd ir izcils CIP aģents. Viņš algo Kelvinu, lai ar viņa grāmatvedības prasmju palīdzību izsekotu ierīci, kura ASV spiegošanas jomā var radīt jucekli. Dīvainais pāris sastopas ar pārspēku, taču viņiem sanāk arī daži varoņdarbi.

programme.title: Saraksts
programme.desc: Kad viņas līgavainis pārguļ ar slavenību no sava sapņu saraksta, Ebija dodas uz Losandželosu, bruņojusies vienīgi ar pieciem vārdiem un tādām fantāzijām kā miljoniem citu parastu cilvēku, lai pārgulētu ar kādu no sava saraksta.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Modiljāni. Trīs dienas uz neprāta spārniem
programme.desc: Pirmā pasaules kara laikā Parīzē bohēmiskais mākslinieks Modiljāni cenšas izvairīties no bumbām, policistiem, draudzenēm un kritiķiem, pieaugošā izmisumā meklējot mājas savai mākslai.

programme.title: Venoms
programme.desc: Reportiera Edija Broka pētījumu lokā ir tēmas, uz ko valdība piever acis. Veicot žurnālistisko izmeklēšanu, Broks nejauši nonāk kontaktā ar ārpuszemes simbiotu, kas pārņem viņa ķermeni. Savienojumā ar simbiotu Broks iegūst superspējas un kļūst par fascinējošo varoni Venomu. Nu viņam jāsadarbojas ar šo parazītisko dzīvības formu ķermenī, lai izglābtu savu dzīvību.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Betis - Osasuna
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC. Carlos Ulberg-Dominick Reyes
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Dubai Basketball - Partizan Mozzart Bet Belgrade
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

Island Life
programme.desc: A couple want to embrace the laid-back lifestyle on Washington Island. They hope to find a large waterfront property with plenty of room for guests.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which Rebecca Budig shows viewers some of the worlds most amazing, luxurious and extraordinary water featured homes. You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple are eager to trade in a cramped apartment in Queens for a spacious house just steps from the Atlantic Ocean in Long Beach, New York.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple are ready to buy their first home together in Long Beach, New York. They hope to find a condo near the beach with views of the water.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A woman has big dreams for a move back to Washington Island. In addition to opening a restaurant, she has plans to find a home with rental potential.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A couple want to embrace the laid-back lifestyle on Washington Island. They hope to find a large waterfront property with plenty of room for guests.

programme.title: Bahamas Life
programme.desc: The idyllic Bahamas are the perfect getaway for travellers and vacationers alike, but for some, once you visit the paradisaical islands, its hard to forget their beauty. These enamored individuals drop their city lives for these stunning Caribbean shores, leaving their livelihoods, stresses and struggles behind. In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Castle Impossible

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: Daphne and Ian look to reinstate one of the original chateau bedrooms that once hosted real Kings and Queens of France. They plan an ornate resto.

programme.title: Brother vs. Brother
programme.desc: Property experts Johnathan and Drew Scott compete to complete their renovation projects. Alongside a chosen team of experts, the pair are given a budget of $500,000 and an equal timeline to complete their home renovations. In each episode the teams revamp a different property, which are then judged and valued by an appraiser and real estate expert to assess which property has seen a larger increase in value. The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: The Kalamas tackle a renovation of Kamohais childhood home for his parents, and theyre the toughest design clients the duo has ever had.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: Earths moon is only one of hundreds in the solar system, each of them a mysterious and often bizarre world. Could alien moons offer a key to exploring outer space and perhaps even finding a new home for humanity?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are ready to wrangle some wild deals in the Lone Star State. Along the way, the guys test-drive a 1968 Buick Riviera, become riveted by a blacksmiths anvil collection, and meet up with NFL legend, Emmitt Smith.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are fishin for big deals in the Sunshine State! Between beach days and dinner with WWE superstar Titus ONeil, the gang is casting a wide net in St. Petersburg, Florida.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: Earths moon is only one of hundreds in the solar system, each of them a mysterious and often bizarre world. Could alien moons offer a key to exploring outer space and perhaps even finding a new home for humanity?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul deploy the largest piece of equipment theyve ever used to dig deeper into the mystery of the possible alien spacecraft buried in the lower meadow of Mt. Wilson ranch, but their investigation is threatened by mysterious interference.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are ready to wrangle some wild deals in the Lone Star State. Along the way, the guys test-drive a 1968 Buick Riviera, become riveted by a blacksmiths anvil collection, and meet up with NFL legend, Emmitt Smith.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are fishin for big deals in the Sunshine State! Between beach days and dinner with WWE superstar Titus ONeil, the gang is casting a wide net in St. Petersburg, Florida.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to the heart of the Bluegrass State. In Lexington, Kentucky, the team brings a 41 Ford Coupe Deluxe roaring back to life, and legendary Coach John Calipari assists with a University of Kentucky basketball collection.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are making some revolutionary deals in Boston, Massachusetts. The guys have a wicked awesome visit as they check out a Patriotic painting, try their hand at rowing, and take aim at a Brown Bess musket from the 1700s.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: This is the most mysterious of the Dead Sea Scrolls. An ancient treasure map, recorded on a rare Copper Scroll, could lead to billions of dollars of buried treasure in gold, in silver, in jewels. Where is the secret treasure of the Copper Scroll?

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: The Tower of Babel, Sodom and Gomorrah, Mount Sinai are some of the greatest Old Testament stories ever told. Yet these iconic places have seemingly vanished from the map. Where are the Old Testaments lost places--and what might they reveal?

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: An armoured-car depot employee uses his insider knowledge to plan a heist that could net him, and the longtime friends he recruits, more than $18 million in cash.

programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rise from the ashes and start anew in Phoenix, Arizona. Along the way, Rick check out rare vintage Americana items, Chum checks out a mid-century furniture collection, and Corey gets in the ring for some boxing memorabilia.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner

There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 presents the most fascinating inventions, creations, events and historical figures of the ancient world. Take a journey back in time and discover some of the most amazing facts about ancient civilizations in this entertaining countdown television series, to find out things you never knew about Greeks, Egyptians, Romans and more. Combining CGI and archival footage, the show ranks different things in every episode, from greatest monuments and ships and cities and dictators and much more.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Primate sightings in the Alaskan woods have the team puzzled, since experts say that monkeys have never lived in Alaska. The team investigates whether there could be a variety in the Alaska Triangle that is making meals out of men.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Japan, 1612: Legendary samurai Musashi meets arch rival Kojiro in a climactic duel. Modern-day warrior SFC Terry Schappert goes inside some of the most famous warrior cultures of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: Ancient Top
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 presents the most fascinating inventions, creations, events and historical figures of the ancient world. Take a journey back in time and discover some of the most amazing facts about ancient civilizations in this entertaining countdown television series, to find out things you never knew about Greeks, Egyptians, Romans and more. Combining CGI and archival footage, the show ranks different things in every episode, from greatest monuments and ships and cities and dictators and much more.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Primate sightings in the Alaskan woods have the team puzzled, since experts say that monkeys have never lived in Alaska. The team investigates whether there could be a variety in the Alaska Triangle that is making meals out of men.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Japan, 1612: Legendary samurai Musashi meets arch rival Kojiro in a climactic duel. Modern-day warrior SFC Terry Schappert goes inside some of the most famous warrior cultures of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Rome: Rise and Fall of an Empire
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. programme.title: Warriors

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Nothing beats the taste of a Southern fried meal and Bobby traces its amazing journey to your plate. In Alabama, Bobby wades among 275,000 catfish during feeding time, and discovers how each fish scooped from the pond becomes a fillet within an hour.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Join Don Wildman as he uncovers an ancient escape route and the birthplace of Jesus. He sets out to find the truth behind Jerusalems most mysterious and enduring prophecies, the people who foretold them and what was left underground.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Some of Americas most important historical and cultural treasures have been lost or stolen from famous museums, government archives and private collections. Host Brad Meltzer sets out to find a number of these precious artifacts, such as George Washingtons teeth, Apollo 11 moon landing tapes, ground zero flag from the September 11 attacks, Hitlers personal photo albums, and more. Brad is also soliciting tips from the audience, and offering a money reward.

programme.title: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar
programme.desc: Lost Relics of the Knights Templar follows the exploits of treasure hunters Hamilton White and his long-time friend, Carl Cookson, as they search for the treasure hoard reputed to have belonged to the legendary Knights Templar. The mysterious Knights were the equivalent of todays special forces and were the most skilled fighters in the ranks of the Crusaders. However, up until the present day, no major item belonging to the Knights has ever been discovered. But Hamilton and Carl believe that they have now found a treasure trove that reveals who the Knights were, how they practised their beliefs, and why they were hunted, imprisoned and disbanded by Papal decree in 1307. Experts offer their analysis and opinion to clarify the history.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. A unique murder documentary series that offers a reminder of the delicate and poignant side to each investigation.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: A true-life crime documentary series that blends dramatic re-enactments with interviews from family and friends of the crime victims along with commentary from law enforcment officers, legal professionals and criminal psychologists. Each 60 minute episode features a specific case where the darkest fears of victims become harrowing realities. Epsiodes include such tales as when Matthew Heikkila shoots his parents and then terrorizes his girlfriend; when a flight attendant breaks her own rule of traveling alone just once and pays the ultimate price; when 22-year-old college student Kari Swensen goes for a run in the Montana wilderness and is taken prisoner by two mountain men; and when recently divorced Tanya Petro goes missing after meeting a new man.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: A Killer Among Friends
programme.desc: When a teen disappears, the whole town feels on edge. As suspicion turns inward, her closest friends wonder if the danger was beside them all along.

programme.title: The Bakersfield 3: A tale of murder and motherhood
programme.desc: When two friends disappear and another is murdered, their mums join forces to try and solve three terrible mysteries. Are these three cases connected?

programme.title: The Bakersfield 3: A Tale Of Murder And Motherhood
programme.desc: Tragic discoveries solidify the mums fear that their cases intertwine. Their kids were on dark paths that brought them close to dangerous characters.

programme.title: The Bakersfield 3: A Tale Of Murder And Motherhood
programme.desc: As police hunt for a killer, a press conference threatens the mums bonds. An arrest furthers the investigation, but answers wont come easily.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Disappeared is an American documentary TV show that contains dramatic re-enactments and interviews with law enforcement officers, investigators, and relatives connected with cases in which individuals have gone missing without a trace. The stories are heartbreaking and unbelievable, the families of people who have gone missing never give up hope. Some cases have tragic endings, some are heartwarming, but most of them are still open which makes the agony of the families go on.

programme.title: Deadliest Families
programme.desc: When Kamils wife vanishes, he becomes the primary suspect. Police face a battle to prove their case in court until new evidence changes everything.

programme.title: Шаляпин
programme.desc: Шаляпин в метаниях. Теперь у него две семьи, каждая из которых требует его внимания. Бесконечные разъезды по двум городам отнимают у него все силы. А, кроме того, в атмосфере растущих волнений в стране монархисты и революционеры требуют от него "занять позицию". Публика, обожавшая знаменитого певца, начинает его ненавидеть. Все хотят, чтобы Фёдор сделал выбор…

programme.title: Шаляпин
programme.desc: 1918 год. Петроград. В России революция. Шаляпин уверен, что в эту новую жизнь он без труда впишется. Но проблем с каждым днём становится всё больше, и Шаляпин понимает, что его искусство в революционной России не так востребовано как прежде. Он получает предложение уехать в длительное заграничное турне и возникает необходимость решить с какой семьёй он поедет. Перед ним встаёт сложный моральный выбор.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: На заводе АВАНГАРД, что в деревне Малые Колпаны, в Ленинградской области, почти 75 лет делали бенгальские огни и хлопушки. Ежегодно отсюда отправляли миллионы этих праздничных изделий. До тех пор, пока в октябре 2018 года завод не взорвался, устроив последний свой смертельный фейерверк. Унесло жизни пятерых человек и разнесло постройки вокруг себя. Здесь, в Малых Колпанах, всегда жили финны. Это их исконные земли. Но теперь из потомки решают - как им дальше жить? И ждать ли помощи от властей, которые обещали восстановить их посёлок, но теперь забыли про них...

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Крылья
programme.desc: Людмиле 38 лет. Сорокалетие не за горами, и оглядываясь на свою жизнь, она понимает - вспомнить ей особо нечего. Единственные проблески в череде серых будней, состоящих из случайных подработок в качестве медсестры, ухода за больной матерью и воспитанием дочери - это редкие визиты домой мужа Николая, который работает дальнобойщиком. Люда, привыкшая находить плюсы во всех ситуациях, вполне довольна своей судьбой, хотя порой тоскует по яркой молодости и несбывшейся мечте. Ход ее размеренной жизни нарушается в одночасье: Николай присылает письмо, в котором сообщает, что встретил в Москве другую женщину и уходит из семьи. Людмила едет в столицу, чтобы вернуть мужа, но неожиданно становится частью необыкновенного плана одного загадочного и нелюдимого человека, который осуществляет ее мечту и дарит ей крылья.

programme.title: Крылья
programme.desc: Людмиле 38 лет. Сорокалетие не за горами, и оглядываясь на свою жизнь, она понимает - вспомнить ей особо нечего. programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: 7 лет прошло после страшного наводнения в городе Крымске, в котором, по официальным данным, погибло 170 человек. Те, кто выжил, до сих пор считают, что жертв было гораздо больше. В ночь на 7 июля 2012 года, волна высотой 7 метров, ворвалась в спящий город. Она смывала дома вместе с людьми, завязывала в узел многотонные грузовики. Те, кто успевал выплыть, спасались на крышах домов... После трагедии Крымск отстроили. Здесь есть парк с фонтаном, новые магазины и спортивные площадки, памятник жертвам наводнения.

programme.title: Лучик
programme.desc: Глеб живёт в своё удовольствие, ни в чем себе не отказывая. Ни к чему и ни к кому он не привязывается надолго и семьёй обзаводиться не собирается. Но наследник - другое дело, наследник ему нужен. Он обращается в агентство и нанимает Машу, которая должна родить ему сына, получить деньги и исчезнуть. Но как-то так все складывается после рождения сына, что Маша остается в доме Глеба, ведет хозяйство, воспитывает сына, которого все зовут Лучик за его счастливую улыбку. Проходит семь лет, и Глеб понимает, что уже наигрался в семью и возвращается к прежнему разгульному образу жизни. Маша, не желая с этим мириться, уезжает с ребенком. И начинается жестокая битва за сына. На стороне Глеба - лучшие адвокаты, деньги, связи, наконец, закон. На стороне Маши - только любовь Лучика.

programme.title: Лучик
programme.desc: Глеб живёт в своё удовольствие, ни в чем себе не отказывая. Ни к чему и ни к кому он не привязывается надолго и семьёй обзаводиться не собирается. programme.title: Орёл и Решка. Земляне
programme.desc: В общественном транспорте с киприотами познакомиться невозможно, ведь они ездят исключительно на собственных автомобилях. Автобусами обычно пользуются туристы или заробитчане. На каждую тысячу населения Кипра приходится 630 автомобилей, и не каких-нибудь, а люкс класса. Киприоты любят быстрые, большие и дорогие авто, поэтому Michelle Andrade будет передвигаться по острову на роскошном Мазерати. Размеренный темп жизни - норма для киприотов. Кирилл Макашов познакомится с коренными киприотами и узнает, без чего они не представляют свой день. Также ведущий поедет на горную ферму и попытается самостоятельно изготовить козий сыр. Что из этого получится?

programme.title: Провинциальный детектив
programme.desc: Заведующая городской библиотекой Татьяна Дашкова и медсестра Ольга Брянцева живут в небольшом очаровательном городке с древней историей и дружат с детства. Образованность, начитанность и неиссякаемый интерес к жизни Татьяны, в сочетании с практичностью, находчивостью и живостью ума Ольги дают удивительные результаты. Их тандем способен разобраться в самых запутанных ситуациях и выяснить истинные мотивы любого преступления, которых случается немало в этом, кажущемся спокойным, городке. Главное — внимание к мелочам и деталям, а также хорошее знание детективной литературы. Ведь героиням во всех делах помогают Шерлок Холмс, Отец Браун и другие известные детективы из произведений классической литературы.

programme.title: Заступники
programme.desc: По доносу о взяточничестве арестован уважаемый прокурор. Нина подозревает, что ее телефон стоит на прослушивании.

programme.title: Балтия неделя
programme.desc: Литовского волонтера Михаила Андриянова в Клайпеде знает каждый. Именно к нему обращаются за помощью люди, попавшие в беду. Он лично развозит нуждающимся мешки с одеждой, находит и кормит бездомных, отвозит на реабилитацию алкоголиков, помогает беженцам.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Побываем в ресторане, где практически все работники - роботы. Ученые узнали, как разрушать раковые клетки, используя инфракрасное излучение. Расскажем об уникальном способе, позволяющем людям ощутить значимость своей жизни.

programme.title: 13 больница
programme.desc: Талантливый хирург Кирилл Акиншин узнает о страшном диагнозе, а затем попадает в клинику, где ему обещают продлить жизнь. Уже со стойки регистрации Кириллу кажется, что с больницей что-то не так: обычные исследования проводят с амулетами в руках, а зав.отделением с легкостью берется за неоперабельную опухоль.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: 7 лет прошло после страшного наводнения в городе Крымске, в котором, по официальным данным, погибло 170 человек. Те, кто выжил, до сих пор считают, что жертв было гораздо больше. В ночь на 7 июля 2012 года, волна высотой 7 метров, ворвалась в спящий город. Она смывала дома вместе с людьми, завязывала в узел многотонные грузовики. Те, кто успевал выплыть, спасались на крышах домов... После трагедии Крымск отстроили. Здесь есть парк с фонтаном, новые магазины и спортивные площадки, памятник жертвам наводнения.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Лучик
programme.desc: Глеб живёт в своё удовольствие, ни в чем себе не отказывая. Ни к чему и ни к кому он не привязывается надолго и семьёй обзаводиться не собирается. Но наследник - другое дело, наследник ему нужен. Он обращается в агентство и нанимает Машу, которая должна родить ему сына, получить деньги и исчезнуть. Но как-то так все складывается после рождения сына, что Маша остается в доме Глеба, ведет хозяйство, воспитывает сына, которого все зовут Лучик за его счастливую улыбку. Проходит семь лет, и Глеб понимает, что уже наигрался в семью и возвращается к прежнему разгульному образу жизни. Маша, не желая с этим мириться, уезжает с ребенком. И начинается жестокая битва за сына. На стороне Глеба - лучшие адвокаты, деньги, связи, наконец, закон. На стороне Маши - только любовь Лучика.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: Подмосковный фермер Михаил Шляпников придумал свою денежную единицу - колион. Своё название крестьянская валюта получила в честь деревни Колионово, в которую бывший московский бизнесмен перебрался 20 лет назад. Здесь он занимается сельским хозяйством и строит самое настоящее государство в государстве. С этой целью он и создал собственную валюту. Колионами он рассчитывается с крестьянами и соседями-фермерам. Недавно прокуратура обвинила Михаила в подрыве единой финансовой системы и теперь проверяет законность его колионов. Но Шляпников не отчаивается и обещает - если запретят колионы, введёт новую валюту - "путинки".

programme.title: Пуанты для Плюшки
programme.desc: Несколько лет назад Наташа была балериной. Теперь же она весит больше 90 кг, а муж называет ее "Плюшкой", - как из-за лишнего веса, так и из-за пристрастия к сладостям "от Сергеича". Съедая любимую плюшку, она нет-нет да пожалуется нарисованному на упаковке "Сергеичу" на скучную работу, отсутствие детей, неработающего мужа. И Сергеич всегда ее понимает. После встречи с бывшей наставницей жизнь Наташи круто меняется - ей предлагают преподавать балет. После первого же занятия Наташа встречает настоящего Сергеича - он пришел за своей дочкой, которая занимается в ее группе. И скоро Наташа понимает, что это - настоящая любовь. Но что ей делать с мужем и планами завести ребенка, а также со своими комплексами и лишними килограммами?
